flags.description: Revenue item description (use empty to clear)
flags.name: --description

flags.description: External developer revenue item ID (use empty to clear)
flags.name: --external-developer-revenue-item-id

flags.description: Developer quantity estimate (use empty to clear)
flags.name: --developer-quantity-estimate
flags.validation: Must be a number greater than or equal to 0 when provided.

flags.description: Quantity estimate ID (use empty to clear)
flags.name: --quantity-estimate
flags.validation: When set, must reference a quantity estimate related to the project revenue item.

flags.description: Price estimate ID (use empty to clear)
flags.name: --price-estimate
flags.validation: When set, must reference a price estimate related to the project revenue item.

permissions: Update is allowed for admins or users who are manager members of the project broker.
side_effects: Updates the specified project revenue item.
validation_notes: The project revenue item ID argument is required. At least one updatable field must be provided. Project cannot be changed after creation. Developer quantity estimate must be a number greater than or equal to 0 when provided. Quantity estimate must reference a related quantity estimate, and price estimate must reference a related price estimate.
